attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: i have many concerns with this app, when i woke up i found that my pet t-rex was neutered and wasn’t able to reproduce with his gf harold the chinchilla, i was quite upset but then i had later found Clifford the big red dog was now the size of rat and he had eaten harold. this app has ruined mine and my t-rexs lives i will forever hold this app accountable and do not recommend downloading.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: My phone started acting really strange and was glitching after downloading and that’s never happened before ... i figured the only thing i had done different was downloading this app so i deleted it and just like that, everything returned back to normal. Don’t waste your time with this app, it’ll mess your phone up and drain your battery!! 👎🏼👎🏼

attributes.title: La Llorona stole my brother
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app I expected a friendly format to keep me updated on our Lord Donald J. Trump, but instead upon opening the app the cold, dead hand of La Llorona reached through my screen and yanked my younger brother back with it. We haven’t seen him in four days. Am I entitled to financial compensation? Please help. Do not download this app if you want your siblings to stay alive. I beg of you.

attributes.title: It a really bad app
attributes.review: Why I give this a one is because it so terrible and I don’t think this should me in the App Store anymore my 3 reasons why I think it’s so terrible one is because it bad in general  my next opinion is because Why is this even app my final opinion is what is there to do in this app if it only has two so it’s for a reason because it’s bad

attributes.title: What I’m tarnation?!
attributes.review: Wish I could give this zero star rating. I downloaded this app to get updates but it lags so much and ends up freezing my phone and I’ve had to restart my phone over and over multiple times. Like what in heck is this? This whole app is poorly designed, horrible navigation. Just all around waste.

attributes.title: Horrible App! TERRIBLE!
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible, as soon as I opened it I began getting countless telemarketing calls and junk mail. It froze my phone for hours and I had to reset it to have function again. Also there are lots of crazies on here who don’t believe COVID is a hoax, Wild! I’m also convinced it contributed to some guy slapping my dog, lit my flag on fire, and called my poor sweet grandma a commie. A disgrace!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER❌❌😡😡🤬🤬🤬🤬
attributes.review: WORST APP EVER this app is so slow it made my phone run out of battery it had a  glitch and shut down my phone this app will send you unlimited REAL life zebras to your house and then they know your address. my stuffed animal talked to me and said that this app WILL make you randomly pinch you through out the day WORST APP EVER SHOULD NOT BE AN APP DO NOT RECOMMEND GETTING THIS APP UNLESS YO WANT THE FOLLOWING ABOVE⬆️⬆️⬆️ to occur to you. Goodbye thank you for your time.

attributes.title: This app made eat my cats ashes
attributes.review: While I was using this orange looking persons app I realized that if all lives matter then all animals matter so when I was done I decide that I should always be with my poor cat so I ate me and it was delicious immaculate taste like shrimp cocktail could have never been better so thank you for making me realize that I should never hang out with Dora ever again

attributes.title: Trash straight GARBAGE 🤮
attributes.review: Don’t even waste your time downloading the app it’s not even worth it. That’s exactly why we are in level 7 of Jumanji now. Just throw the whole campaign and the corporation funding this in the garbage because this has to be a joke. On behalf of most of the Gen Z population this app MUST GO! May peace be with you I feel bad for whoever else has to come across this horrible app.
